RequestBody.name: Java SDK Function Tool Call Test
RequestBody.instructions: You are a helpful assistant that can help fetch data from files you know about.

function.name: getAirlinePriceToDestinationForSeason

time.description: An approximate time of year at which travel is planned.

airline.description: The name of an airline that flights can be booked on.

function.description: Given a desired location, airline, and approximate time of year, retrieves estimated prices.

function.name: getFavoriteVacationDestination
function.description: Retrieves the user's unambiguously preferred location for vacations.

function.name: getPreferredAirlineForSeason
function.description: Given a season like winter or spring, retrieves the user's preferred airline carrier.

error.message:
3 validation errors for Request
body -> tools -> 1 -> type
  unexpected value; permitted: <ToolTypeParam.CODE_INTERPRETER: 'code_interpreter'> (type=value_error.const; given=function; permitted=(<ToolTypeParam.CODE_INTERPRETER: 'code_interpreter'>,))
body -> tools -> 1 -> type
  unexpected value; permitted: <ToolTypeParam.RETRIEVAL: 'retrieval'> (type=value_error.const; given=function; permitted=(<ToolTypeParam.RETRIEVAL: 'retrieval'>,))
body -> tools -> 1 -> function -> parameters
  field required (type=value_error.missing)
